author: Rabit

changelog.release_notes:
Time traveling is here!

* New animations & some graphics changes
* Time machine activation by shake
* Time traveling settings
* Working PM & second indicators
* Small fixes

* Charge/discharge animation
* Redrawn foreground images
* Small code improvements

Now it's working time machine!

* Added configurable destination time
* Added alarm on destination time reached
* Bugfix: hours drifting on tick

Version 1.1:
* Switched to SDK 3.6 (make sure, that you already installed 3.6 pebble time firmware)
* Flux animation
* Settings: animation every second/minute/off

First version of great Flux Capacitor watchface!

Version 1.0:
* Shows present time & destination time
* Looks nice!))

description:
Compact version of Flux Capacitor from Back to the Future trilogy for your Pebble Time. This working version of time machine can help you to travel in time.

October 21, 2015 already behind, but portable Flux Capacitor will help you not to forget about that!

Features:
* Looks nice!))
* Shows present time & destination time
* Flux animation
* Alarm on destination time reached (slow time machine)
* Show the battery current charge / charge state
* Instant traveling to the destination time on shake
* Working PM indicators
* Settings: animation every second/minute/off, destination time, time traveling
* Open source & content

TODO:
* Support int64_t to travel further in time

Donation:
If you like Back to the Future, you can support my open-source development by a small Bitcoin donation: 15phQNwkVs3fXxvxzBkhuhXA2xoKikPfUy

Thank you!
